name: Can you win the corona?
description:
Its my first game in game engine and also it was a corona based game.. made in 10 minutes, lol

It can be also played in mobile..

Won - you deafeted the corona

Tie - you are in quarantine ( house arrest)

Lose - you infected by corona

Optimization:

I Give my best and think hard to optimize the game to 4mb because i don't know how to optimize the game in GODOT 😅😂

Goal:

Try to won

DISCLAIMER:

  1. NO MUSIC (sorry for this because i want to optimize this game)
  2. PLAY IT IN FULL SCREEN 😅
  3. LOW QUALITY IMAGES (sorry for this too because i want to optimize this game)
